info.name: Fake Ubuntu Unity Overlay Scrollbar
info.description: Simulates the Ubuntu Unity overlay scrollbars. (Obviously since it's pure css, it's not perfect, just a dirty hack. Could be perfected into a userstyle.)
info.additionalInfo:
Based on style 76999 by user 162905

Gimp source of the used image can be downloaded from here:
http://gnome-look.org/content/download.php?content=156217&id=2&tan=62248368
